titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Vietnam
Vietnam

div.head: Legislation
div.p: There is no systematic declassification of government documents. Permission to view archival records is granted on a case by case basis.

div.head: Location
div.p: Office of Vietnamese Ministry of Foreign Affairs: No. 1 Ton That Dam, Ba Dinh, Ha Noi.
National Archives Center I: 18 Vu Phan Ham, Phuong Yen Hoa, Cau Giay, Ha Noi. (Colonial Records)
National Archives II: 2 Le Duan, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City. (Republic of Vietnam Records)
National Archives III: 34 Phan Ke Binh, Ba Dinh District, Ha Noi. (Post-1945 records of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam)

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Older records are divided between several National Archives sites in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City. For more recent records, contact the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. Researchers must acquire a readerâ€™s card upon visiting the archives, which for foreigners will require photocopies of passport, visa and a letter from a sponsoring institution.
